name: We Are But Worm Food: A One-Word RPG
name_original: We Are But Worm Food: A One-Word RPG
description:
This is a fan-made sequel to We Are But Worms by Riverhouse Games. It can be played completely independently, however, it uses the same characters as the original, and it is recommended you play the original first. 

This one-word RPG is an entirely fan-made work. I do not have any affiliation with Riverhouse Games, and the contents of We Are But Worm Food are not meant to be taken as canonical. 

This has been in development since early 2022, and I'm happy to finally be releasing it to the world. We Are But Worms is a game that never left my mind since the first time I played, it pushes the genre in so many interesting directions, playing with existing norms, and I truly have not played any RPG since which has lived up to it. I hope I can give other people a similar experience to what We Are But Worms gave me.

The contents of We Are But Worm Food are free to use for any purpose, commercial or otherwise, under the CC0 license. 

FAQ:

Q: How long is We Are But Worm Food?

A: The duration of play depends greatly on the player(s), but it's more-or-less the same length as the original. 

Q: Can I change [X]?

A: Feel free to play with any house rules that make things more enjoyable, how you choose to experience We Are But Worm Food is entirely up to you! 

Q: Do I need access to a printer in order to play?

A: No, you can download the pdf on your mobile device.

Note:  We Are But Worm Food has mildly graphic imagery and may not be suitable for all audiences.

You can ask in the comments if you have any questions/clarifications that I didn't address and I'll try to get back to you! 

(This game is not based on factual events, and any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.)
